Description:
Verify that bookmarks are properly added to bookmarks file and appear
      in all access points.

Add a new bookmark into a specific location within the bookmarks
      hierarchy.
Verify new folder creation and nesting of new folders.
Verify folder(s) are correctly deleted.
Verify that disclosure triangles/folder icons are in sync.
Verify separators are properly added/deleted.
Verify that changes are saved over restart/crash
surf using user-defined 'custom keyword'.
Show and hide columns.

Verify that it is NOT possible to drop an item onto itself or its
      immediate parent or child

Determine whether native and non-native images are correctly copied
      to the system Clipboard.

Determine whether HTML entities can be properly copied to other
      applications.

Confirm that dragging an Internet shortcut to the
      browser window opens the URL

Feature: D&D from the desktop – Text files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a text file to the browser
      window displays the document contents

Confirm that dragging a supported image file
       to the browser window display the file

Feature: D&D from the desktop – Plug-in files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a helper-application
       file to the browser window opens the file
       properly

Verify that items dragged onto the
      application icon are handled properly

Verify that dragging the URL proxy icon to a browser
      window opens that URL in the target window

Feature:
D&D <a href="/drag-url-browser-toolbar/">
      Given link is non-fetchable, non-retrievable Personal Toolbar
Description: Determine if you can drag items to and from the Personal Toolbar

113893Implement New Form Functionality
      (waiting on bug status)

Verify that there are "Big tooltips" - Similar to popup help for
        Windows control panels

Verify that you have the ability to search by typing keyword
        synonyms, and verbs to bring up related topics in help content. Verify
        that if the entered phrase may not actually exist in the help document,
        but it is related to topic.

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content. (Verify the content is in local
        documents)

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problem "if you
        can't sign on"

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a section for an Upgrade
        Guide.

Verify that page up and down, in fact, page up and down in
        help

Verify that clicking non clickable regions in help causes no
        behavior
Determine whether What's new in Netscape 6 displays correctly
Determine whether Security and Privacy displays correctly

Determine whether Netscape Technical Support displays
        correctly
Determine whether the Feedback Center displays correctly
Determine whether the About Netscape displays correctly

Determine that you can open all the selections in the Help drop
        down menu using short cut buttons.

Verify that the correct link is recorded after a server
        redirect.
Delete a History entry
Clear all of history

Verify that things that aren't supposed to be added to history
        aren't (eg chorme:/// url's)

Verify recently visited sites are in Back and Forward button
        dropdown menu and work.

Verify that a new session is started with a new browser window or a
        restart.

Verify that browser remembers scroll state when returning to pages
        in SH

Determine that after resizing an image to it's original size, it is
        possible to resize to window again.

Determine that you can right click an image and save to your local
        drive.
Determine that you are able to set image as wallpaper.

Determine that it is possible to print an image without changing
        the currently loaded page

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        local hard drive.

Determine whether X Bitmap (XBM) format images can be displayed.Note: XBM will not be supported in the initial 5.0
          release.

Determine whether GIF 87 images are properly displayed across
        different bit depths.
Test applets with liveconnect
Test lifecycle of applets

Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Verify that when the password manager has been disabled, it is no
      longer in use, even for passwords already saved

Verify that when you have saved multiple username's and password's
      for a website, you are later presented with those same choices

Verify that when you have saved a username and password for a website
      and you later change the password, that password manager picks up the new
      password

Verify that when you disable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you no longer are asked if you would like to save passwords and
      longer get prefilled info on sites

Verify that when you enable password manager from the preferences
      panel, you are asked if you would like to save usernames and passwords
      and get prefilled info on sites

Verify that you can remove a username and password for a given site
      and it will no longer autofill on that sight nor will it be listed in
      password manager (espn.com)

Feature: Preferences, passwords never saved, remove all
Description:
Verify that you can remove all site and username information from the
      passwords never saved section of password manager (ivillage.com)

Verify that you can remove all username and password information and
      it will no longer autofill nor will anything be listed in password
      manager (lycos.com)
Determine whether a page with frames prints properly
Determine if CSS pages print properly
Determine if  top web sites print properly
Determine if character styles print correctly
Determine that header/footer info gets printed
Determine if Realaudio works properly
Determine if windows media player works fine

Verify that a user can change the search engine
Verify that a search query/results can be bookmarked
Determine whether the double-click gesture functions properly.

Determine whether shift-select gestures for text function

Retaining non-default size on reopen or new window

Adding a already added panel
Delete a panel

Determine that interface features (buttons, textfield, droplist)

Open web location in a Composer window. Includes test to dismiss

Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in a new
        Navigator window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.
Open web locations to various image files, such as.gif,.jpg.

Use of the native Win32 file picker to navigate through directories

Access from main menu and access keys.

Visually inspect menu bar, floating component bar and all the
